name: Kamikaze Squirrel
description:
Can you save your tree from dynamite kamikaze squirrels?  Test your skills in this fast-paced classic arcade shooter all drawn in glorious pixel art! 

  • Fight huge bosses!
  • Gain power ups for more ammo and to heal your tree! 
  • Hold off the horde of kamikaze squirrels! 
  • Swing to some country chip tune jams!

CONTROLS:

  • Mouse - move rifle left and right
  • Left Click or Q - fire
  • Right Click or "R" - reload
  • Esc - pause menu
